body:
So I wanted to try to make a map with a group of people so they can get the benifits of working together on a map. I've got a ip for the bukkit server that I will TRY to use for this event. The Ip is below. The bad part is that I can only do it with Hamachi so I've created 3 different parties (Below) so people can join and have some fun. This is a 1.7.10 bukkit server so people 1.8 will have to sadly go down to 1.7.9 or 1.7.10...
Hope to see you guys there,
George1864

P.S. If this doesn't properly fit in Game Discussion I will happily take down this blog.

IP:  My Hamachi Ipv4

Hamachi Groups: NebulaMap1  NebulaMap2  NebulaMap3
                                                        (Passwords are all 123)
